snippet: Clubs across Europe will be missing their top Asian and African players over the next month because of the Asian Cup and African Cup of Nations.
lead_paragraph: Clubs across Europe will be missing their top Asian and African players over the next month because of the Asian Cup and African Cup of Nations.

headline.main: Players Get a Call They Can't Ignore From National Teams
headline.print_headline: Players Get a Call They Can't Ignore From National Teams
